column1: Local Foods////Before the Duck Confit came back
column2: I had been hooked on the Truffled Egg Salad Sandwich. Mmm definitely my 2nd favorite. Pretzel bun really makes this sandwich. My toughest decision
column4: is whether to get soup or sides..and then which sides? Tuscan Kale side is definitely one of my must haves. Sometimes
column5: being the indecisive fatty that I am
column6: I get both the sides & soup. #firstworldproblems
